title: US Judge Blocks Trump From Cutting Medicaid Funding For Planned Parenthood In 22 States
description: A Planned Parenthood spokesperson said the judge "again recognized the 'defund' law for what it is: unconstitutional and dangerous."
content: BOSTON, Dec 2 (Reuters) - A federal judge on Tuesday blocked U.S. President Donald Trumps administration from enforcing in 22 states a provision of the Republicans signature tax and domestic policy b… [+2745 chars]
